name: Arden
description: An armored knight from Chalphy. Dreams of fighting on the front lines, but is often assigned to castle defense. Appears in Fire Emblem: Genealogy of the Holy War.
origin: Fire Emblem: Genealogy of the Holy War
insights: Arden is the only hero with Follow-Up Ring.
Arden has the highest <abbr title="Health Points">HP</abbr> potential possible in Fire Emblem Heroes.
Arden has the highest <abbr title="Defense">DEF</abbr> potential possible in Fire Emblem Heroes.
Arden has the highest <abbr title="Health Points">HP</abbr> potential possible among Armored heroes.
Arden has the highest <abbr title="Defense">DEF</abbr> potential possible among Armored heroes.
Arden has the highest <abbr title="Health Points">HP</abbr> potential possible among Sword heroes.
Arden has the highest <abbr title="Defense">DEF</abbr> potential possible among Sword heroes.
Arden has the highest <abbr title="Health Points">HP</abbr> potential possible among Red heroes.
Arden has the highest <abbr title="Defense">DEF</abbr> potential possible among Red heroes.
Arden has the lowest <abbr title="Speed">SPD</abbr> potential possible in Fire Emblem Heroes.
Arden has the lowest <abbr title="Speed">SPD</abbr> potential possible among Armored heroes.
Arden has the lowest <abbr title="Resistance">RES</abbr> potential possible among Armored heroes.
Arden has the lowest <abbr title="Speed">SPD</abbr> potential possible among Sword heroes.
Arden has the lowest <abbr title="Speed">SPD</abbr> potential possible among Red heroes.

dialogue.text: My name is Arden! I'm one of Lord Sigurd of Chalphy's men. Good to meet you!
This castle's nice and solid. They put me in charge of defending our castle, so you can trust me—I know castles!
Things in my world... Not so good right now. I just stick with Lord Sigurd. I'll serve him up until the very end.
I just want to get married, have kids, and work hard for my family. Someday...
You wanna try on my armor? That's funny. You wouldn't even be able to stand up!
If you need protection, I'm your man. But do me a favor and call as soon as you can, OK? It's going to take me a while to get there.
Arden here! I guess you must be <Player Name>. I got a message for ya from your pal <Friend Name>.
I'm strong, I'm tough...and I ain't slow!
Feels like my armor got a little bit lighter!
There's a huge weight on my shoulders. I can feel it.
I better look after myself, with you expecting so much from me!

Why is everybody always leaving me behind? I swear... No, I get it. My armor's heavy. It makes me slow, and I can't keep up with 'em. The thing is, that's my job! I'm an armored knight. Take away this thick armor, and I couldn't protect anybody! There's no way I'm gonna stop doing my job, so I've made myself square with it. Listen to me grumble! I guess you just did, now that I mention it. Hey, I feel a lot better now. Thanks!
